title: Honey roast parsnips
description: Roasting parsnips in honey and sherry brings out the natural sweetness in this earthy vegetable.
serves: Serves 6-8 as part of a roast dinner, or 4 as a stand-alone side dish
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz parsnips, peeled and cut into quarters lengthways
salt and freshly ground black pepper
